title: 1.12.2的几个问题
author: tianqi482
txt_content:
好不容易水出40金粒的我又来了！1、如何做出类似1.13+中气泡柱的效果？
2、如何修改方块滑度、硬度和爆炸抗性？（最好能把我已经放的一起改了，不然我得手撸近100000个方块）
3、小白太憨了，如何增加他的射箭频率？

replies.author: 黑茶RGO
replies.txt_content:
1.以0,20,0的灵魂沙为例，水面为0,40,0
particle bubble 0 30 0 0.5 10 0.5 0.05 20
execute @e[x=0,y=0,z=0,dx=0,dy=20,dz=0] ~ ~ ~ tp @s ~ ~0.5 ~

3.
summon skeleton ~ ~ ~ {Tags:["小白本体"],HandItems:[{id:"bow"},{}],Passengers:[{id:"skeleton",CustomName"隐形小白",HandItems:[{id:"bow"},{}],ActiveEffects:[{Id:14,Duration:2147483647,ShowParticles:0b}]},{id:"skeleton",CustomName"隐形小白",,HandItems:[{id:"bow"},{}],ActiveEffects:[{Id:14,Duration:2147483647,ShowParticles:0b}]},{id:"skeleton",CustomName"隐形小白",HandItems:[{id:"bow"},{}],ActiveEffects:[{Id:14,Duration:2147483647,ShowParticles:0b}]},{id:"skeleton",CustomName"隐形小白",HandItems:[{id:"bow"},{}],ActiveEffects:[{Id:14,Duration:2147483647,ShowParticles:0b}]}]}

然后高频以下指令：
scoreboard players tag @e[name=隐形小白] add die
execute 小白 ~ ~ ~ scoreboard players tag @e[name=隐形小白,r=2] remove die
kill @e[name=隐形小白,tag=die]
